message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $110. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price. Looking forward to your response!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. I am willing to pay $105 for it.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your valuation of the product. I would like to propose an offer of $107 for this premium item. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am willing to pay $106 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. I would like to propose an offer of $108 for this premium item. I hope this meets within your budget while still reflecting the value of the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. I am willing to pay $107 for the product.
